00008 class WEvent
00009 {
00010 public:
00011   enum ErrorCodes
00012   {
00013     ERR_OK = 0,
00014     ERR_TIMEOUT = -1
00015   };
00016 
00017   WEvent();
00018   ~WEvent();
00019 
00020   void set();
00021   void reset();
00022   int wait(int timeout = -1) const;
00023   HANDLE handle() const;
00024 
00025 private:

00028 
00032 inline WEvent::WEvent()
00033 {
00034   event_ = CreateEvent(0, TRUE, FALSE, 0);
00035 }
00036 
00040 inline WEvent::~WEvent()
00041 {
00042   CloseHandle(event_);
00043 }
00044 
00048 inline void WEvent::set()
00049 {
00050   SetEvent(event_);
00051 }
00052 
00056 inline void WEvent::reset()
00057 {
00058   ResetEvent(event_);
00059 }
00060 
00069 inline int WEvent::wait(int timeout) const
00070 {
00071   return WaitForSingleObject(event_, timeout) == WAIT_OBJECT_0 ? ERR_OK : ERR_TIMEOUT;
00072 }
00073 
00079 inline HANDLE WEvent::handle() const
00080 {
00081   return event_;
00082 }
